title: Lovely meat restaurant
text: This is literally an excellent restaunt to eat delicious meat. The buffalo fillet from Uruguay is one of the best i have ever had.

title: Stadium
text: This is the stadium where the olympic games started. There is a ticket if you want to go inside which is a must!

title: Great place
text: So much history in just one place. We had a great time there and this place is totally suggested if you want to feel the vibes of the ancient Greece.

title: Great wine list
text:
An amazing variety of wines. I fell in love with this place and we visited 3 times.
Also the food was great, congrats to the ched!
The staff was very friendly and explained to us all the wines that we ordered.
place: By The Glass wine bar & bistrot

title: Great food
text: We had a great meal at God's restaurant. Friendly service and relaxed feeling inside. The food was simple, greek and delicious!!

title: Decent place
text: A decent place to go in Athens for food with very interesting flavors. It is highly recommended. Thank you.

title: Beautiful territory
text: Its a beautiful sightseeing territory with two temples, one fully renovated, second mostly original, old orthodox church and many ruins.

title: Breathtaki experience
text: Such a breathtaking experience. The grandeur of the history here is beyond words. A visit here is totally recommended. I also recommend going to the Acropolis Museum afterwards.

title: Traditional Greek Food
text: What a nice and lovely restaurant with friendly staff and great view of Acropolis. Beef souvlaki and the caviar spread was delicious.

title: Lovely place
text: Lovely place with lots of restaurants nearby too. Such a great vibe in the late evenings for food and drinks.

title: Amazing view
text: Amazing view from the top of this bar. You can drink your cocktail and, at the same time, you fall in love with the acropolis.
